name: 2nd International Conference on Education in Post Pandemic
content: 2nd International Conference on Education in Post Pandemic (EDUPAN 2024) March 09 \~ 10, 2024, Virtual Conference https://edupan2024.org/ Scope 2nd International Conference on Education in Post Pandemic (EDUPAN 2024) will act as a major forum for the presentation of innovative ideas, approaches, developments, and research projects in the areas of Education in post Pandemic COVID 19\. It also aims to provide a platform for exchanging ideas in new emerging trends that needs more focus and exposure and will attempt to publish proposals that strengthen our goals . Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to: Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Accreditation requirements for hybrid and online degrees • AI and machine learning in Education, instructional methodologies, and assessments • Child and Family Education • Collaborative, Interactive Learning • Curriculum Reform and Trends • Diversity in Education • Education for development • E-learning • Games and Simulations in Education • Global Issues in Education and Research • Innovative educational Practices • Integrating Technology in Curriculum: Challenges & Strategies • Modified Hybrid and blended teaching and learning models • Multimedia/ Mobile / Ubiquitous Computing in Education • Online Education Before and After the COVID-19 Pandemic • Pandemic-based Educational Research • Pedagogy Enhancement with E-Learning • Professional Development for Teachers in ICT • Technology Support for Pervasive Learning • Tools for 21st Century Learning • Virtual and Remote Laboratories • Web-based Tools for Education Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by March 02, 2024 (Final Call). Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Cybernetics & Informatics (IJCI) (Confirmed). Selected papers from EDUPAN 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. • International Journal of Education (IJE) • International Journal on Integrating Technology in Education (IJITE) Important Dates • Submission Deadline : March 02, 2024 (Final Call) • Authors Notification : March 07, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : March 08, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : edupan@edupan2024.org or edupanconfe@gmail.com
